attributes.action: Reform Council Tax so that 2nd homes are double taxed rather than half taxed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Because second homes are used only occasionally they inhibit the growth of local economies because, pro rata, less money is spent by the occupiers of second homes in that particular local area and because they cause a population decline in those same areas due to lack of housing thus agrievating the problem further
